General.Name: Shenzhen Ecobeauty Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Ecobeauty Co., Ltd. engages in the civil engineering and construction business. The company undertakes municipal public, road construction, building engineering, railway engineering, landscaping and landscape engineering, landscape design, ecological restoration, and nursery base works. It also engages in the highways, building engineering construction, urban and road lighting, water conservancy and hydropower, river and lake renovation, environmental protection, and other professional businesses; and other businesses, including cultural and sports global tourism, characteristic towns, pastoral complexes, health industry, government public infrastructure, people's livelihood project construction, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Beijing Shenhuaxin Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Ecobeauty Co., Ltd. in May 2016. Shenzhen Ecobeauty Co., Ltd. incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Haina Baichuan Headquarters Building, Shenzhen, China, 518101
